title: Cauliflower mac 'n cheese
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '120g grated Cheddar cheese', '120ml double cream', '1 tablespoon ghee or butter', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
